titles.title: To require the National Transportation Safety Board to include affordable alternative recommendations and corrective actions in its reports.
To require the National Transportation Safety Board to include affordable alternative recommendations and corrective actions in its reports.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

bill.summary: Requires the National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB), if in periodic transportation safety investigative reports and studies it recommends replacement of major equipment or operating systems that require significant funding or time, to include, if available, alternative safe interim recommendations and corrective actions that a state or local government authority is able to afford and implement in a timely manner.
